page.title: 20School Camp
page.content: In the past 2 years our headteacher Mr Conridge and his wife have been taking the junior class to Beverly Trust Christian Centre at Chagford. We spent a whole week there. In 1984 we went to Kestor Rock and Fernworthy on Dartmoor. In 1985 we went from camp to Paignton Zoo, Parke Estate, Haytor Rock and visited the Underground Passages in Exeter as well as the Museum and the Cathedral. We enjoyed swimming at the City Baths. It was better this year because there was no rain. It was fun sleeping at Beverly. It is a large house with lots of rooms including a games room, kitchen and large lounge. Each day we went out on a mini-bus. Two student teachers came with us as well as our teacher. By Nicola Pearce, age 10
